name: Wavetables
description: Each mint is a unique visual instrument. A complete DSP signal chain — wave folding, bitcrushing, ring modulation, comb filtering — runs per-pixel on the GPU, transforming 20 oscillator waveforms into living color fields. 55 palettes with continuous hue rotation. 5 animation modes from Perlin drift to Lorenz chaos. Press V to enter isometric 3D and explore your waveform as a landscape. S: save, P: pause, +/-: speed.
